title: System Error
likely_causes: ECM communication fault|Sensor malfunction|Power supply issue
checks: Check ECM power and ground|Test sensors|Inspect harness connections

title: Engine Warning
likely_causes: Low oil pressure|High engine temperature|Air filter restriction
checks: Check engine oil level|Verify coolant level|Inspect air filter

title: Hydraulic Fault
checks: Check hydraulic fluid level|Replace filter|Allow pump to cool
